00020 #          define TN(X,Y) typename idl::get_function_type<BOOST_TYPEOF(&X::Y)>::type
00021 #          define SARITY(X,Y) idl::get_function_type<BOOST_TYPEOF(&X::Y)>::arity
00022 
00023 /**
00024  *  @class get_function_type<T>
00025  *  @brief Used to deduce the function signature of signals/member function pointers.
00026  *
00027  *  Given a class name and function or signal name, the combination of BOOST_TYPEOF() and get_function_type
00028  *  will return a type of the form R(ARGS) which can then be used in other templates.
00029  *
00030  */
00031             template<typename T>
00032             struct get_function_type { typedef T type; };
00033 
00034             template<typename Class, typename Signature, bool is_const = false>
00035             struct member_from_signature { /*BOOST_STATIC_ASSERT(false);*/ };
00036 
00037 #       include <boost/preprocessor/iteration/iterate.hpp>
00038 #       define BOOST_PP_ITERATION_LIMITS (0, GET_FUNCTION_TYPE_SIZE -1 )
00039 #       define BOOST_PP_FILENAME_1 <boost/idl/get_function_type.hpp>
00040 #       include BOOST_PP_ITERATE()
00041 
00042 
00043 } } // namespace boost::idl
00044 
00045 #   endif // BOOST_IDL_GET_FUNCTION_TYPE_HPP_INCLUDED
00046 
00047 #else // BOOST_PP_IS_ITERATING
00048 
00049 #   define n BOOST_PP_ITERATION()
00050 
00051 
00052 
00053 template<typename C, typename R BOOST_PP_ENUM_TRAILING_PARAMS(n, typename A)>
00054 struct member_from_signature<C, R(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(n,A)), false> 
00055 { 
00056     typedef typename boost::remove_pointer<R(C::*)(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(n,A))>::type type; 
00057     static const int  arity    = n;
00058     static const bool is_const = false;
00059 };
00060 template<typename C, typename R BOOST_PP_ENUM_TRAILING_PARAMS(n, typename A)>
00061 struct member_from_signature<C, R(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(n,A)), true> 
00062 { 
00063     typedef typename boost::remove_pointer<R(C::*)(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(n,A))const>::type type; 
00064     static const int  arity    = n;
00065     static const bool is_const = true;
00066 };
00067 
00068 
00069 
00070 template<typename R, typename C BOOST_PP_ENUM_TRAILING_PARAMS(n, typename A)>
00071 struct get_function_type<R(C::*)(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(n,A))> 
00072 { 
00073     typedef typename boost::remove_pointer<R(C::*)(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(n,A))>::type type; 
00074     static const int  arity = boost::function_traits<R(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(n,A))>::arity;
00075     static const bool is_const = false;
00076 };
00077 template<typename R, typename C BOOST_PP_ENUM_TRAILING_PARAMS(n, typename A)>
00078 struct get_function_type<R(C::*)(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(n,A))const> 
00079 { 
00080     typedef typename boost::remove_pointer<R(C::*)(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(n,A))const>::type type; 
00081     static const int  arity = boost::function_traits<R(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(n,A))>::arity;
00082     static const bool is_const = true;
00083 };
